There are 140 seeds. There's no reason for a slow download. In preferences, make sure you can connect to a lot of peers. Mine is set at 200 the download should fly in. Probably worth "Reset Bans" in Utorrent, right mouse click on torrent and reset bans, then "Clear Peer List." You should be fine after that.
